Exaggerate: The claim may exaggerate the actions taken by the Trump administration in comparison to other administrations in addressing the "gun problem."
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence or support to prove that the Trump administration has done "much more than most administrations" to address the gun problem.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the actions taken by the Trump administration are effective in curbing gun violence, without providing evidence or data to support this assumption.
Exist alternative explanation: There are alternative explanations to the claim, as the Trump administration has simultaneously advanced policies that expand gun rights or prevent efforts to limit gun rights, which contradicts the claim of addressing the "gun problem."
